ygData.subject: Re: bronze weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve looked all over Qeynos and haven t found either of them. Fiera Mindbender
ygData.messageBody:
I've looked all over Qeynos and haven't found either of them.
Fiera Mindbender

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Brewhaus [mailto:brewhaus@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 10:31 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: bronze weapons
>
>
> From: Brewhaus <brewhaus@...>
>
> Could you please ask your friend where in Qeynos he found them? That
> would help me out a great deal.
>
> Thanks,
>
> Aarreran
>
> > Actually, yes. The only place I know of that sells the pet spells of
> > 8th level and higher is in High Hold Keep, and the only place I've seen
> > the Enchant metal spells is in Nerriak, although a friend of mine says
> > he's seen them in Qeynos also.
> >
> > -Bukaru, Dark Elf Enchanter
>
